version_description:
*Added Dungeons-work your way through our new dungeons to get amazing new items
*Graphics improvements
*Fixed many bugs and improved gameplay

*Added clans-form a clan and participate in clan wars to get new chests with awesome items
*Bug fixes and improvements

*Re-designed mastery points
*Added new fighting arenas
*Added new languages
*Clan improvements
*Bug fixes

*Added campaign mode-fight evil monsters and receive amazing prizes in the new campaign mode
*Added more inventory slots
*Bug fixes and improvements

*Added new weapons with Mythical rarity
*Reach level 55 and you will unlock tasks
*Added new league with amazing rewards
*Improved daily bonus rewards
*Bug fixes and improvements to the overall gameplay experience

*Added a better clan search-you can define the clan level you want to find and see only clans with available spots
*Improve clan control-you can define min' player level that can join your clan
*Added more clan roles-we added Elder and co-leader roles.
*Added clan friendly battles-you can do friendly fights against other clan members
*Bug fixes and improvements

*Increased level cap- become even greater!
*Added many new weapons, armor, attacks- all the good stuff
*After ice, fire, and Iron, it is the time of the Poison dungeon
*A special Legendary Halloween weapon and shield
*Bug fixes and improvements

A very Merry Christmas update!

A brand new game mode, BOSS FIGHTS! -fight the evil Krampus alone or co-op with your clan members and get some very festive rewards!

More of what you love-we added loads of brand new weapons, armor, and moves, some are very lethal and some are beautiful enough to be hanged on a tree

Leaderboard- we already know that your clan is the best but just to let the rest of the world know, we added a leaderboard to this festive event

*Added brand new shields, swords and more
*Added power-ups, give your fighter the edge in battle with one of many powerups you can equip before a fight
*Added clan leaderboards, now you can see the leading clans and how your clan is ranked compared to others
*Added Arabic language support
*Bug fixes and improvements

*Increased level cap! we heard level 70 is not enough for you, so we increased it!
*Bug fixes and improvements
